architectureNotes.singlePackage: One deployable unit. NestJS serves API at /api/* and Vue static build for all other routes. Simplifies Railway deployment.
architectureNotes.buildProcess: 1) Vue builds to dist/client via Vite, 2) NestJS compiles to dist/, 3) NestJS ServeStaticModule serves dist/client/. Single 'npm run build' does both.
architectureNotes.walletConnection: Using @gala-chain/connect BrowserConnectClient for MetaMask. Wallet state in Pinia store with localStorage persistence via @vueuse/core useStorage.
architectureNotes.transactionSigning: All write operations auto-signed via connected wallet through @gala-chain/connect. SDK handles signature formatting (secp256k1, rsv format).
architectureNotes.stateManagement: Pinia stores: wallet, tokens, nfts, creatorCollections, transactions, toasts. Composables wrap store actions for component use.
architectureNotes.apiDesign: Frontend talks directly to GalaChain for most operations. NestJS /api routes reserved for future backend-required features (export job processing).
architectureNotes.authorization: Mint/burn buttons conditionally rendered via v-if based on wallet authority. Authority checked via GalaChain queries (FetchAllowances, token class authority).
architectureNotes.railwayDeployment: Railway auto-detects Node.js. Runs: npm install → npm run build → npm start. Single service, no config needed. Procfile optional.

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
